text:
I went to visit the Harbourfront branch and was guided properly to do a manual closure of my fund as there is a problem with the online feature.

Julian Yang has been very patient and calm in the way he addressed my concern. He take extra step to figure things out and made the conversation easy to understand. He had further provide support on details regarding bank loans and IPA. I appreciate his honesty in the way he delivers his work.

Wanted to seek counter staff help to deposit $ . Went there at 3.30pm on 4 March 2025 at harbour front branch and was shocked to see that they have closed their main entrance with a sign that stopped customers from queueing as the staff claimed there is a long queue waiting inside. DBS website clearly stated its operating hours is till 4pm. So why did the counter services stop at 3.30pm?? Even if the queue is long, shouldnâ€™t the queue number stop at 4pm? If not, pls amend your operating hours- it is totally misleading!! I am truly disappointed with this miscommunication.

Pls train your staff! I was there wanting to close my children account under me. Asking if I should take a Queue number or do it at the machine. The staff at the door just ask me to wait and wait...without giving me any information. Later another staff came out then she told me to get a queue number. Wasting my time...

I visited the branch for personal loan and they rejected me first saying check online and I insisted to see someone to better understand the details and the person came and showed their website with shallow information.
They will be the one losing their job if we dont need them, I spent my time to go there and their attitude was so negative.
Counter service very very slow, waited two hours also got another 20 pax in front of me. give up queuing.
